betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In order to obtain a hidden catalog, you have to do a few things:

Get a regular sign
Answer the four questions and put the answers on said sign in the same order (all lowercase)
Right click the written sign
There will be answers with more characters than signs allow, just type out as many as possible.

There will be no hints, so don't even try it.
You'll need the bobmazon level 6 achievement to order anything.



1
When we scream into the distance, who will answer?

2
The invisible force, sometimes subtle and sometimes not, covers our eyes directed at the skies.

3
The fluorescent oscilloscope gives us the passcode of random numbers. Who holds the answers?

4
Ever revolving, never still, a sight for the patient that reeks of tobacco, dancing perpetually.
